## BFI dataset

We'll use the Big-Five Inventory dataset to estimate accuracy and stability 
measures using the bootnet package. 
After cleaning our data and stablishing the groupings of variables, 
we'll look at:

1. Estimation with bootnet
2. Stability of edge weights
3. Stability of centrality measures
4. Stability of differences in edge weights or in centrality measures
